name: Iceland's Jewels Crush
description:
Iceland's Jewels Crush is an amazing match-3 puzzle game with 900 LEVELS and No lives System so you can play as much as you like! with great crystal smash style puzzle game. There are many crazy puzzles that are created from beautiful sapphire or diamond gems. It's an addictive game for everyone and all ages.
HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more jewels of the same!
• Complete the level!
• Remove the jewels as much as you can!
• To get a special jewel!
